generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, indicating it is a road for vehicles.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on paved areas alongside the road, which are clearly designated sidewalks.
- building: There are multi-story structures with windows and commercial signage visible on the right side of the image, which are buildings.
- vegetation: Several trees are visible along the left side of the road and in the background.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a cloudy sky.
- person: Multiple individuals are visible walking on the sidewalks and near the road.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- pole: Various vertical poles, including traffic light poles and utility poles, are visible throughout the scene.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible mounted on a pole on the right side of the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible at the top left corner of the image.
